item.title: Misc
item.description: A few of my (current) favorite things I have few lifetime favorites, but I always have a lot of recent favorites. Here are some: book: To the Lighthouse (Virginia Woolf had an amazing understanding of the diversity of human perspective) song: 929 (Badlands is still my favorite Halsey album, though.) TV show: Search Party (It lined up well with my own restlessness at the time of watching.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a PhD student at the University of Cambridge, advised by Ferenc Huszar and Sebastian Nowozin. I’m generously funded by Microsoft through an i-CASE fellowship. I am interested in machine learning, specifically the science of deep learning, as well as what deep learning can enable in other fields, such as physics and mathematics.
